lines.gurmukhi: kwlr mYN boey bIj aupjY n pwn Dwn Kyq mY fwry su qwN qy AiDk Anwj hY
lines.transliteration_english: Kaalar Main Boay Beej Oupajai N Paan Dhaana , Khayt Mai Daaray Su Taan Tay Adhik Anaaj Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as seed sown in saline land does not grow even a leaf, but if this land is treated with gypsum salt, it gives much yield.

lines.gurmukhi: kwlr sY krq sbwr jm sw aUsu qO pwvk pRsMg qp qyj auprwj hY
lines.transliteration_english: Kaalar Sai Karat Sabaar Jam Saa Oosu Tau , Paavak Prasang Tap Tayj Ouparaaj Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Saline, when mixed with water vaporises and then condenses, but when brought near fire produces a blast.

lines.gurmukhi: jsq sMXukq h√çY imlq hY sIq jl Acvq swNiq suK qiRKw BRm Bwj hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jasat Sanyoukat Hvai Milat Hai Seet Jala , Achavat Saanti Soukh Trikhaa Bhram Bhaaj Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The same saline salt when brought in contact with zinc container cools the water that gives peace and comfort when drunk. It satiates the craving and thirst.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy Awqmw Acyq sMgq suBwv hyq sikq sikq gq isv isv swj hY ]598]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Aatamaa Achayt Sangat Soubhaav Hayta , Sakit Sakit Gat Siv Siv Saaj Hai ?598?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, a human soul under the influence of good and bad company and developing love and attachment with consciousless maya becomes consciousless. And by loving the conscious benevolent Lord, it also becomes benevolent and conscientious.  (598)
